Name: Sirius
Description: Runs Sirius 6.0 to annotate compounds with formula, structure, and compound class

Parameters.Name: Sirius Program Path
Parameters.Description: Local path to Sirius executable

Parameters.Name: Save Sirius Result
Parameters.Description: Save Sirius project space output for use with Sirius GUI.  If True, project space file is saved in the same directory as the corresponding cdResult file

Parameters.Name: Sirius Username
Parameters.Description: Username for Sirius web account, created here: https://portal.bright-giant.com/auth/login

Parameters.Name: Sirius password
Parameters.Description: Password for Sirius web account, created here: https://portal.bright-giant.com/auth/login

Parameters.Name: Checked Feature Status Handling
Parameters.Description: How should checked features be handled by Sirius processing?

Parameters.Name: Peak Quality Threshold
Parameters.Description: Minimum peak quality rating for Sirius processing

Parameters.Name: Maximum MW
Parameters.Description: Maximum molecular weight for Sirius processing

Parameters.Name: Predict Formulas
Parameters.Description: Toggle prediction of molecular formula by Sirius

Parameters.Name: Maximum Formula Candidates
Parameters.Description: Limit for maximum number of candidate formulas predicted for each compound

Parameters.Name: MS1 Mass Accuracy [ppm]
Parameters.Description: Mass accuracy threshold for MS1 spectra

Parameters.Name: MS2 Mass Accuracy [ppm]
Parameters.Description: Mass accuracy threshold for MS2 spectra

Parameters.Name: Filter by Isotope Pattern
Parameters.Description: When filtering is enabled, molecular formulas are excluded if their theoretical isotope pattern does not match the theoretical one, even if their MS/MS pattern has high score

Parameters.Name: Enforce Lipid Detection Filtering
Parameters.Description: Sirius may predict that an MS/MS spectrum is a lipid spectrum. If enabled, the corresponding molecular formula will be enforced as molecular formula candidate

Parameters.Name: Perform Bottom-Up Formula Search
Parameters.Description: If true, molecular formula generation via bottom up search is enabled

Parameters.Name: De novo Formula Generation Threshold
Parameters.Description: Specifies the m/z below which de novo molecular formula generation is enabled. Set to 0 to disable de novo molecular formula generation

Parameters.Name: Formula Elemental Constraints
Parameters.Description: Enforced formula constraints are always considered.  Alphabet should be provided as a string with maximum number of given elements in brackets.  Do not add B, Cl, Br, S, or Se to this list - they are detected automatically

Parameters.Name: Predict Structures
Parameters.Description: Toggle prediction of molecular structure by CSI:FingerID

Parameters.Name: PubChem as Fallback
Parameters.Description: Use PubChem as a fallback database if no matches found in primary databases. If False, then PubChem will be used as a primary database

Parameters.Name: Predict Compound Classes
Parameters.Description: Toggle prediction of compound classes by ClassyFire (CANOPUS)

Parameters.Name: Predict de Novo Structures
Parameters.Description: Toggle prediction of de novo structures by MSNovelist

Parameters.Name: De Novo Structure Candidates Limit
Parameters.Description: Maximum number of de novo structures to be predicted by MSNovelist
